item.description: I am currently a quantitative developer at Standard Chartered. I got my PhD in Computer Science from HKU PL Group advised by Dr. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira. My research fields were programming languages, type systems and formal verification. During my PhD studies, I worked on a JVM implementation of System F with support for full tail-call elimination (see this paper for more). I worked on the design of a dependently-typed calculus featuring general recursion and decidable type-checking (see this paper for more).
